Lovász-losses, from https://github.com/bermanmaxim/LovaszSoftmax

{% raw %}

class LovaszHingeLossFlat[source]

LovaszHingeLossFlat(*args, axis=-1, ignore=None, **kwargs) :: BaseLoss

Same as LovaszHingeLoss but flattens input and target

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class LovaszHingeLoss[source]

LovaszHingeLoss(ignore=None) :: Module

Lovasz-Hinge loss from https://arxiv.org/abs/1705.08790, with per_image=True

Todo

Binary Lovasz hinge loss logits: [P] Variable, logits at each prediction (between -\infty and +\infty) labels: [P] Tensor, binary ground truth labels (0 or 1) ignore: label to ignore

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
lov_hinge = LovaszHingeLossFlat()
outp = torch.randn(4,1,128,128)
target = torch.randint(0, 2, (4,1,128,128))
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
lov_hinge(outp, target)

TensorBase(1.4343)
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
lovasz_hinge(outp, target)

tensor(1.4343)
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class LovaszSigmoidLossFlat[source]

LovaszSigmoidLossFlat(*args, axis=-1, ignore=None, **kwargs) :: BaseLoss

Same as LovaszSigmoidLoss but flattens input and target

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class LovaszSigmoidLoss[source]

LovaszSigmoidLoss(ignore=None) :: Module

Lovasz-Sigmoid loss from https://arxiv.org/abs/1705.08790, with per_image=False

Todo

probas: [P, C] Variable, logits at each prediction (between -\infty and +\infty) labels: [P] Tensor, binary ground truth labels (0 or 1) ignore: label to ignore

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
lov_sigmoid = LovaszSigmoidLossFlat()
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
lov_sigmoid(outp, target)

TensorBase(0.5826)
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
lovasz_softmax(torch.sigmoid(outp), target, classes=[1])

tensor(0.5826)
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class LovaszSoftmaxLossFlat[source]

LovaszSoftmaxLossFlat(*args, axis=1, classes='present', ignore=None, **kwargs) :: BaseLoss

Same as LovaszSigmoidLoss but flattens input and target

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class LovaszSoftmaxLoss[source]

LovaszSoftmaxLoss(classes='present', ignore=None) :: Module

Lovasz-Sigmoid loss from https://arxiv.org/abs/1705.08790, with per_image=False

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
lov_softmax = LovaszSoftmaxLossFlat()
outp_multi = torch.randn(4,7,128,128)
target_multi = torch.randint(0, 7, (4,1,128,128))
lov_softmax(outp_multi, target_multi)

TensorBase(0.8593)
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
lovasz_softmax(F.softmax(outp_multi, dim=1), target_multi)

tensor(0.8593)
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
lov_softmax_subset = LovaszSoftmaxLossFlat(classes=[1,2])
lov_softmax_subset(outp_multi, target_multi)

TensorBase(0.8599)
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
lovasz_softmax(F.softmax(outp_multi, dim=1), target_multi, classes=[1,2])

tensor(0.8599)
{% endraw %}
